actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to extend authorizations of appropriations for 2 years, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Older Americans Act Amendments - Revises the Older Americans Act of 1965 by: (1) extending the authorization of appropriations for two years; and (2) requiring that organizations and projects serving low-income, racial minority, or limited English-speaking individuals be given preference in awarding certain grants and contracts.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to extend authorizations of appropriations for 2 years, and for other purposes.
